model

Class Universe

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Universe

  • public class Universe
extends Object
    A class that rappresents a Universe as a container of Body.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Universe()
      Creates a universe.
      Universe(Collection<Body> bodies)
      Creates a Universe with the given Body Collection.
